website_summaries.verdict: With this sharpener, you can achieve a high-end sharpness that's based on science and technology.
pros: Simply relies on a small amount of manual power to sharpen all kinds of knives
Designed to create not only sharp edges, but balanced ones as well for even, clean slices
cons: More thorough instructions would be helpful

customer_reviews.title: not true
customer_reviews.text: i like the sharpener well enough no problem there but only thing was they didn't sent the GLOVE..was it a come on?
customer_reviews.author: spotter

customer_reviews.title: Meh... Ok.. Not Great (Disappointing)
customer_reviews.text: Product with great potential that falls short. The “wheel” concept / idea is fantastic. Unfortunately, cheap parts let the wheels wobble and change angles becoming misaligned, and damaging the grind. Too good to be true usually is, and in this case the cost to lower the price is too high, impacting quality. Save your money... buy a higher quality sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: grasiorai

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broke after only few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok the first few times but the sharpening wheels inside squeaked and rattled. Now it actually dulls my knife and two of the sharpening wheels inside are wiggly and sound terrible. Cheep plastic frame as well. Would not recommend this. Now it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product worked quite well. I had several dull knives that this product brought back to life. It works on serrated knives too.
customer_reviews.author: c-racer

customer_reviews.title: You're on your own. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Followed the directions. Spent hours reading reviews and looking for info. Actually made our knives duller! No company to contact.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This made my knives more dull. There was a ceramic wheel that turned and it didn't seem to be doing anything. I think it was defective. And, because I missed my return window by a week now I'm stuck with a worthless piece of junk. I wonder if Amazon takes returns that are defective outside the return window? Oh well, should have gone to my local Target or something.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Don't ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Total Ripoff. No electric cord, no battery. No instructions. Removed all screws, didn't open. Cut my thumb trying to force. A JOKE!!
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE D ROOF

customer_reviews.title: Impressive performance. About kitchen knives sharpened with about 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressive performance. About kitchen knives sharpened with about 10 swipes on 1, 2, 3. All cut paper.
customer_reviews.author: atbillp37

customer_reviews.title: Instructions need better clarification. Slot 2 is first then Slot 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions need better clarification. Slot 2 is first then Slot 3 (marked on the device) finished the knife. Otherwise it works very well!!.
customer_reviews.author: HWR2

customer_reviews.title: Item description is deceptive. It is not a "Pack of 2".
customer_reviews.text: Sharpener is decent, but sharpening grooves feel fragile. Don't see need for a glove, unless you are careless in handling sharp knives. Product description is deceptive. "Pack of 2" is WRONG. It is a single sharpener package. Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: malibukid22

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but this doesn't seem to give my knives a clean edge.
customer_reviews.text: As stated above, this sharpener doesn't seem to give a clean edge and they don't retain their edge for very many uses. The cheaper one I bought many years ago worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth L.

customer_reviews.title: Need to reed more reviews
customer_reviews.text: Did not come up to my expatation nicely made but not a very good sharping tool would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: thom from ohio

customer_reviews.title: Changes everything
customer_reviews.text: After use, I look sharper and slimmer. I lost 10 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Anything Goes

customer_reviews.title: Dulls knifes not sharpen them
customer_reviews.text: It simply is a very bad product. The design actually dulls a reasonably good edge
customer_reviews.author: alan toenniessen

customer_reviews.title: Not a realistic looking flame
customer_reviews.text: These candles are nice but the color of the flame is not realistic looking. It is a whitish green color, not the warm yellow/orange glow I was looking for. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L
